Well the world's first 3d printer that can print electronics has been made.

Excuse me a second cause I was laughed at in college for suggesting that 3d printers could do electronics or circuitry by a bunch of fucking luddite idiots that thought technolgoy could no longer advanced beyond our past level of technology. . . *walks outside and proceeds to laugh so loudly at them that they can hear it a state away*
